subject: Baseball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: A jury on Saturday acquitted the former Yankee catcher Jim Leyritz of D.U.I. manslaughter after days of testimony that centered on whether Leyritz ran a red light moments before a 2007 crash that killed a mother of two.
snippet: A jury on Saturday acquitted the former Yankee catcher Jim Leyritz of D.U.I. manslaughter after days of testimony that centered on whether Leyritz ran a red light moments before a 2007 crash that killed a mother of two.
